fields.title: Phillips Healthcare
fields.description:
• Designed, developed and tested an hour tracking tool using Linux, Struts 2, Tomcat 6, and JUnit
  • Designed and developed the database schema to be the heart of the hour tracking system using PostgreSQL
  • Regularly participated in code reviews both for my code changes and my team members’
  • Bug fixes and new feature implementation on XIRIS (eXtended Internet Radiology Information System) using Linux, Struts 1, and Tomcat 5/6 with PostgreSQL and Oracle

fields.title: University of Texas El Paso

fields.title: Acumen Solutions
fields.description:
• Provide consulting services during the entire software development cycle, particularly in software design and development
  • Developed applications for various clients using different platforms such as .NET, Java, Force.com, and objective-c
  • Developed web services to integrate with legacy and/or external systems
  • Promoted December 2010

fields.title: Salesforce
fields.description:
Worked on Customer Relationship Management software under the user interface and locale team; exposed to the Software as a service paradigm and cloud computing and applied it to the daily duties required by my job.

  • Implemented interactive user-interface features and bug fixes.
  • Algorithm design and analysis to help improve performance.
  • Implemented, analyzed and improved algorithms in the realm of language and semantic processing for languages such as Turkish and Hungarian, new languages which were not yet supported by the CRM app.
  • Participated in agile software development process using scrum.

fields.title: University of Texas El Paso
fields.description:
• Designed and developed a computer laboratory management system in which computer lab managers could manage everything related to their specific lab such as run usage reports, set availability hours, add staff , etc.
  • Created web services and batch file scripts to aid in collecting computer usage statistics
  • Developed a report generator application for our print system administrator

fields.title: Promotion
fields.description: Promoted from an intern to a full time Software Engineer a month before my graduation date.

fields.title: Promotion
fields.description: Promoted from CI to CII due to work on the Comcast SMB project.
